name: Network Issues
description: Tests failed due to network connectivity or timeout issues

name: Element Not Found
description: Tests failed because expected UI elements were not found or visible

name: Assertion Failures
description: Tests failed due to assertion/expectation mismatches

name: Authentication Issues
description: Tests failed due to authentication or authorization problems

name: Page Load Issues
description: Tests failed due to page loading or navigation issues

name: Browser Issues
description: Tests failed due to browser crashes or disconnections
